item.title: Nginx Reverse Proxy
item.description: Nginx reverse proxy needs where we want to get access to few resources by one external IP address and port. I used that for several http web services (debian repository, my website and phpmyadmin). The following config is pairing server_name and proxy_pass as target location. Pleese look at last section with default_server atribute. It needs to set default site (in this case page with 501 Internal Error). Quickstart Create webproxy.
